name: TheAnswerLittleRock
0:
”Alexa, Play The Answer Little Rock”
”Alexa, ask The Answer Little Rock to play”
”Alexa, tell The Answer Little Rock to play”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the answer little rock
des: 101.1 FM The ANSWER is a Newstalk radio station based in Little Rock, AR, that offers conservative news programming, political discussions and debates. You can listen live, find our station schedule and hear all of the latest breaking news.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
